rows.title: Resources
rows.message_text: This is a collection of teaching resources.

rows.title: Resource Finder
rows.message_text: The Resource Finder creates lists of all the resources associated with a group of topics.

rows.title: Instructional Routines
rows.message_text: These routines have 1 to 10-minute tasks to do with your class. Some are meant to be embedded in lessons and some are for breaks.

rows.title: Rich Tasks
rows.message_text: These are 1 to 3 lesson tasks that go into topics or problems in more depth.

rows.title: Puzzles
rows.message_text: These are math puzzles divided into increasing levels of sophistication â€“ both in math content and in difficulty.

rows.title: Games
rows.message_text: These are math games to be played in the classroom.

rows.title: Storybooks
rows.message_text: These storybooks are for an adult to read to a child. They have math comments and guiding questions on every page.

rows.title: Glossary
rows.message_text: This is a glossary of significant math vocabulary.

rows.title: Help
rows.message_text: If you ever want to see this introduction again, just click on the question mark.
